title: Short-Term Maker Learning Experience-Based Language Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Comprehension and Digital Tool Usage Experience
context.additional_context: Language learning combining VR simulations and drop-in maker activities in smartphone-centric environments; learners develop language application skills through role-playing as professionals (medical/legal/technical)

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic communication expressions tailored to given professional scenarios (medical/legal/technical) with 80% accuracy in VR simulation environments.
Learners can generate and use language expressions required in problem-solving processes utilizing physical/digital tools (smartphone apps) at least three times through drop-in maker activities.
Learners can describe the language acquisition process in short-term learning experiences in detail through formative assessments (observation records, self-reflection journals).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
